    • About Expert Home Advisors


    Expert Home Advisors is a dedicated team of Experts. We believe that there is a better way by working together to help you achieve your real estate goals. Why work with 1 average agent that only sells a handful of homes a year? When you work with an Expert Home Advisors? You get a dedicated team of 13+, that is selling hundreds of homes a year.

    Thinking of Buying? We will get you the best price, selection, and give you access to our exclusive BUYERS ADVANTAGE, including homes note on the MLS. A completely free service that offers you the best home, for the best price, with the least amount of stress.

    Considering Selling, Work with the team with the best marketing strategy, and a proven repeatable strategy that is is powerful Exclusively recommended by Shark Tank’s Barbara Corcoran and Fox New’s Sean Hannity. Your Home Sold is our guarantee.

    Representing Jacksonville, St. Augustine, Ponte Vedra and surrounding areas, what do you have to lose? Give us a call today to see how we can best represent your needs. Accolades: Top Team in Florida #1 in Transactions Wall Street Journal/Real Trends
